script:
import com.lucidworks.searchhub.analytics._
val mailData = SearchHubLoader.loadFromSolr(SearchHubLoader.Config(sqlContext))
val withThreads = MailThreadJob.createThreadGroups(mailData)
 withThreads.write.format("solr").options(SearchHubLoader.opts()).mode(org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode.Overwrite).save
